description: Request for tender for the provision of live streaming content management solution
full_summary:
### Canada School of Public Service Streaming Content and Management Solution
#### Competitive Request for Proposal
The Canada School of Public Service (CSPS) is seeking the services of a Contractor for the provision of a live streaming content management solution.

#### Background
The CSPS has identified a need for a live streaming content management solution that can meet the demands of the educational institution. The solution will facilitate the delivery of online content and support educational programs, with an allocated budget of $1,000,000 for the initial contract and four optional years.

#### Objectives
The objectives of the project are:

- Satisfy the requirements for the provision of live streaming content management solution.
- Provide professional services for implementation and data migration, as well as other services as needed.
- Offer training services to support the adoption of the solution.

####ISED subcontracting opportunities
This project is subject to the provisions of various international trade agreements including but note limited to:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Contract Details

* Solicitation Number: CSPS-RFP-23JP-0703/A
* Reference Number: cb-309-86120997
* Amendment Number: 6
* Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-23
* Expected Contract Start Date: There is no specific start date at this time.
* Expected Contract End Date: There is no specific end date at this time.

#### How to Respond
To submit a response, please access the RFx document through the following link [RFx document](link) and [RFx links] (links to attachments).

#### Contact
If you have any questions or concerns, please contact Michelle at [Solicitation-sollicitation@csps-efpc.gc.ca](mailto:Solicitation-sollicitation@csps-efpc.gc.ca) or (343) 548-0449.  Please note that there is no security requirement associated with this project. 

---
